title: Episode 283: Gracie Abrams
description: “I Love You, I’m Sorry” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Gracie Abrams is a singer and songwriter from Los Angeles. She started putting out music in 2020, and in June 2024, she put out her second album, The Secret of Us. title: Episode 282: Le Tigre
description: “Deceptacon” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Le Tigre originally formed in 1998. They released their self-titled debut album in October 1999.
